basicInfo.desc: This task pivots an RWD Grid and serializes the partial results.

parameter.name: messageID
parameter.desc: The Message ID of a previously executed Report Writer Document.

parameter.name: key
parameter.desc: The node key for the pivoted template (used for partial update)

parameter.name: objectId
parameter.desc: The dss id of the unit being pivoted

parameter.name: objectType
parameter.desc: The dss type of the unit being pivoted

parameter.name: axis
parameter.desc: The target axis of the pivot operation

parameter.name: pos
parameter.desc: The target position within the axis
